content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received a response from the Google command for Lisp key features, which provided several links to websites with information on Lisp. You gave a command to browse one of the links, geeksforgeeks.org, with the question "What are the key features of the Lisp programming language?" However, the computer returned a terminal initialization error.'}

[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does provide information about the key features of the LISP programming language. LISP is machine-independent, uses iterative design methodology, is easily extensible, supports object-oriented programming, and allows for the creation and updating of programs and applications dynamically. It also supports all kinds of data types, decision-making and iterating statements, input and output functions, and custom function creation. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/introduction-to-lisp/#main)', ' (https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/)', 'DSA for Interview Preparation (https://practice.geeksforgeeks.org/courses/dsa-interview-preparation-classroom?utm_source=geeksforgeeks&utm_medium=main_header&utm_campaign=courses)', 'DSA Live for Working Professionals (https://practice.geeksforgeeks.org/courses/geeks-classes-live?utm_source=geeksforgeeks&utm_medium=main_header&utm_campaign=courses)', 'DSA Self-paced in C++/Java (https://practice.geeksforgeeks.org/courses/dsa-self-paced?utm_source=geeksforgeeks&utm_medium=main_header&utm_campaign=courses)']"}]
